html: After fulfilling my civilian service, I started studying software engineering at the [Hasso Plattner Institute](https://www.hpi.uni-potsdam.de/) in Potsdam. During my studies I gained practical experience and research skills. I specialized in Internet technologies and human-machine interfaces. I received my bachelor's degree in 2011.
title: Bachelor's Degree Program

html: In my bachelor's thesis I presented and evaluated the development process with [Orca](http://hpi.uni-potsdam.de/hirschfeld/projects/orca/index.html), a research Web framework developed by a group of fellow students and me. Orca enables single-language high-level Web application development in Smalltalk by automatically translating client-side functionality to JavaScript and providing transparent bidirectional message passing for client-server communication.
title: Bachelor's Thesis

html: With the objective to attain a master's degree, I continued my studies at the [Hasso Plattner Institute](https://www.hpi.uni-potsdam.de/). I specialized in Internet technologies, operating systems, and information systems. Along the way, I gained insights into in-memory databases, embedded systems, parallel programming, metaprogramming, and model-based refactorings, among other things.
title: Master's Degree Program

html: Currently, I am preparing my master's thesis, the last stage of my studies. I am dealing with the question how to teach programming by means of Massive Open Online Courses, such as provided by [edX](https://www.edx.org/), [openHPI](https://openhpi.de/), and [openSAP](https://open.sap.com/).
title: Master's Thesis
